pullrequest.title: Switched ode/bullet tests to value-parameterized tests

content.raw: You use some `#ifdef`,`#else` logic in [helper_physics_generator.hh](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/a3c723a#chg-test/regression/helper_physics_generator.hh), which works while we only have 2 physics engines, but we are planning to have 4 soon. It's a nice idea, but I think your proposal should be refactored to be more scalable.
content.html: You use some #ifdef,#else logic in helper_physics_generator.hh, which works while we only have 2 physics engines, but we are planning to have 4 soon. It's a nice idea, but I think your proposal should be refactored to be more scalable.
